Texts.Eng: A long time ago there were a lot of really big Avian temples. I think there's only one left now.
Texts.Rus: Давным-давно было довольно много больших Авианских храмов... Думаю сейчас остался всего один.

Texts.Eng: A long time ago, we Hylotl sunk some of our greatest monuments beneath the waves, to protect them.
Texts.Rus: В давние времена, мы, Хилотлы, топили наши величайшие монументы, чтобы защитить их.

Texts.Eng: A lot of old Glitch adventurers hoard the treasure they've found over the years.
Texts.Rus: Многие из старых Глитчей-искателей приключений  хранят сокровища, которые они нашли на протяжении многих лет.

Texts.Eng: Floran can't remember a word... It's the name of a big beasst. Ixylix? Oxulung?
Texts.Rus: Флоран не может вспомнить слово... Это имя огромной твари. Иксиликс? Оксулунг?

Texts.Eng: Floran hasss been hunting in the dark - good practice for Caverns.
Texts.Rus: Флоран предпочитает охотится в темноте - хорошая практика для Пещер.

Texts.Eng: Floran hear huge beasst was captured for this year's Hunt!
Texts.Rus: Флоран слышал, что огромное чудовище было поймано для Охоты этого года.

Texts.Eng: Floran is a pretty good hunter - planning to compete thisss year.
Texts.Rus: Флоран очень хороший охотник. Планирует соревноваться в этом году.

Texts.Eng: Floran is the best! Well, sssecond best. You heard of Nuru?
Texts.Rus: Флоран лучший! Ну... второй из лучших. Ты слышал о Нару?

Texts.Eng: Floran really wants the fancy Hunt trophy!
Texts.Rus: Флоран очень хочет получить трофей Охоты.

Texts.Eng: Floran wantss to be a Wrangler one day!
Have you heard of the Baron? He took all my money in a game of cards! As if he needs it, with all those treasures.
Texts.Rus: Вы слышали когда нибудь о Бароне? Он забрал все мои деньги в карточной игре! Как будто они ему нужны, имея столько сокровищ.

Texts.Eng: Have you heard of the Occasus? Apparently they're strange angry people who have been attacking a Glitch keep!
Texts.Rus: Вы слышали об Окказусе? Вполне вероятно, что они те самые, странные злые люди постоянно нападающие на поместье Глитчей!

Texts.Eng: I enjoy collecting books, it's a big part of Hylotl culture.
Texts.Rus: Мне нравиться коллекционировать книги, это большая часть культуры Хилотлов.

Texts.Eng: I grew up hearing stories of items of immense power, bestowed by Kluex himself.
Texts.Rus: Я вырос слушая истории о предметах невероятной силы, дарованные самим Клюэксом.

Texts.Eng: I have heard that purple robed cultist have been attacking a Glitch keep.
Texts.Rus: Я слышал, что культист в фиолетовой робе напал на поместье Глитчей.

Texts.Eng: I hear there are plans to take down the Miniknog...
Texts.Rus: Я слышал, что кто-то планирует свержение Министерства...

Texts.Eng: I heard stories of strange things held in the depths of Miniknog facilities.
Texts.Rus: Я слышал истории о странных вещах, происходящих в глубинах учреждений Министерства.

Texts.Eng: I hope to one day visit the Great Sovereign Temple, but barely anyone knows where it is.
I once heard of a keep owned by an oddball and filled with wonders.
I wish I had wondrous treasures... Some Glitch have some troves of riches!
I wonder what treasures I could amass if I travelled the universe. You hear such stories...
I'd like to become a librarian, but it's a lot of responsibility.
I've heard stories of a Glitch who calls himself the Baron. Apparently he owns mounds of treasure!
Important Glitch relics tend to get handed from Glitch to Glitch, but I've never had one.
Isn't it wondrous when treasures from the past are newly rediscovered? This happens not infrequently among the Hylotl.
It is said the Hylotl of the past kept vast repositories of books.
Many say Big Ape has garnered huge wealth and a plethora of antiquities.
Miniknog territory is vast, with many bases and command posts.
Not all the temples of Kluex are attended by Stargazers, some ancient ones are left in the hands of caretakers.
Our oldest and most impressive architecture is always centered around the worship of Kluex.
People call me a conspiracy theorist, but I know the Miniknog have secrets.
Protecting the wisdom of our ancestors sustain our culture.
Rebels attack the Miniknog often nowadays, targeting established bases...
Some Glitch keeps and castles hold ancient valuables within their walls.
Some relics still survive from the time all Hylotl resided on land.
Some temples of Kluex have ancient guardians. But what are they guarding?
The Avoscript mentions objects of great power. I don't know what they might be.
The Hunt is soon!
The Miniknog are always building new facilities for themselves, but they never close the old ones.
The Miniknog guard all of our cultural heritage.
The Miniknog keep all the wealth and all the treasures.
The Miniknog play their cards close to their chest - few know the extent of what they have and do.
The depths of some temples are forbidden to all - it's how their secrets are protected.
There are temples of Kluex all over the universe, but some are more sacred than others.
There is a lot of value in the written word.
We Avians have big trouble with temple robbers - there are some pretty desirable antiquities in the older temples.
We Hylotl are great custodians of knowledge and information.
We lost a lot to the Floran hoards, but some things survived.
You know about Nuru? She'ss best Floran!
You're pretty ssscrawny; Floran bets you wouldn't make it out of the Caverns.
